name: The Repopulation
blurb: The Repopulation is a Sci-Fi Sandbox-Hybrid MMORPG focusing on player created content and the freedom to choose your own path.

rewards.reward: No Reward
You will receive a Silver Membership Package*, a $20 value. Your name will appear in a list of Kickstarters on our website and in the game credits on request.

You receive $20 in store credit which can be redeemed when the game ships**, as well as your  Silver Membership package*. Your account will gain access to the prefix title \u201cFounder\u201d which will be available exclusively through this Kickstarter opportunity. In addition, you will be given preferred access to private Beta Testing. Your account will be credited with a  Kickstarter Token, which can be redeemed in game for your choice of special rewards*****.

In addition to previous rewards, you will receive an additional $20 in store credit** for a total of $40.00. You are guaranteed at least a 1 day head start before the servers open to the general public.

In addition to previous rewards, your membership is upgraded to the $40 Gold Membership. You are also now guaranteed at least a 2 day head start before the servers open to the general public. Your account will be credited with an additional Kickstarter Token*****, bringing your total to 2.

In addition to previous rewards, and you will receive an additional $20 in store credit bringing your total up to $60. You will also receive another Kickstarter Token*****, bringing your total to 3. You will be upgraded from preferred to Guaranteed access to private Beta testing.
In addition to previous rewards, your Membership will be upgraded to the $60 valued Platinum Membership. You receive an additional $5 in store credit, bringing the total to $65.

In addition to previous rewards, you will receive $15 in store credit** for a total of $80. You will also have an extra day head start bringing the total to 3 days. Last but not least your account is credited with an additional Kickstarter Token*****, bringing the total to 4 tokens.

In addition to previous rewards, the name of your choice*** will be added to your choice of OWON\u2019s Voyage Plaque or FPR\u2019s Founder Plaque in game, and on our web site. The OWON Voyage Plaque is a monument that houses the names of the men and women from the Northern Star colonial vessel. The FPR Founder Plaque is a monument listing the names of the founders of Freedomtown. These plaques will be permanent fixtures in the game world to commemorate your contribution.  You will also have an extra day head start bringing the total to 4 days and an additional $20 in store credit bringing the total to $100.
In addition to previous rewards, you will receive an additional 2 Kickstarter Tokens bringing your total up to 6 and an additional extra day head start bringing the total to 5 days.

In addition to previous rewards, your account will gain access to the suffix title \u201cNorthern Star Veteran\u201d which will be available exclusively through this Kickstarter opportunity. The TSS Northern Star was the original colonial vessel on Rhyldan. You will also receive a preferred position on the Founder or Voyage Plaque and on our web site. You additionally receive a unique plaque that can be placed in your virtual home as a furniture decoration. Your account will be credited with an additional 2 Kickstarter Tokens*****, bringing your total to 8.

In addition to previous rewards, a character name*** of your choice will be subtly inserted into one of the items in the game. For example, there may be a book written by your character name, or your name will be on a client list, etc.  You will also receive an additional 2 Kickstarter Tokens bringing your total up to 10 and an additional extra day head start bringing the total to 6 days.

In addition to previous rewards, you will have an NPC created in game with your input. You will be able to specify the NPCs name***, gender and have some control over their appearance.  You will receive one of the the highest placement positions on the Founder or Voyage Plaque. You will receive an additional guaranteed day of head start access, bringing your total to 7 days.

In addition to the previous rewards, you will be able to select a Personality, Profession and Mood for your NPC likeness. These traits will allow your NPC to take part in more generated mission opportunities that will be given to players in the game. You will receive an additional guaranteed day of head start access, bringing your total to 8 days.

In addition to previous rewards, we will allow you to submit a custom logo that will be added to a specific standard piece of armor or clothing that others can see in game******.  This will be an account wide perk and the piece can be claimed by all of the characters on your account. Your name will be listed in the credits and on our web site as a Sponsor***. You will receive an additional guaranteed day of head start access, bringing the total to 9 days.

In addition to previous rewards, you will receive a custom weapon with the name of your choosing***. This will be a cosmetic item, with the exact same stats as the store bought variant (all of our stats come from Fittings), but it will be a status symbol. You will receive an additional guaranteed day of head start access, bringing the total to 10 days. The 10 day head start can also be shared with 5 other accounts of your choosing.

In addition to previous rewards, we will allocate a Statue monument to you created in your choice of Plymouth or Freedomtown. You will be given your choice of which of these two areas they will appear in, but it is first come first serve and only twelve monuments are available on each side. We\u2019ll also work with you to provide some backstory and lore as to why this character was important****

In addition to $1000 rewards, you will have a second NPC created in game with your input. You will be able to specify the NPCs name***, gender, have some control over their appearance, personality, mood, and profession.

In addition to $1000 rewards, you will be able to select one of the two NPCs you created from the previous levels and we will move that NPC to either the OWON or FPR tutorial areas. You will be given your choice of which of these two areas they will appear in, but it is first come first serve and only ten NPCs are available on each side. In the case that these slots have all been sold out and you are receiving this option through a higher priced pledge, we will substitute this reward by creating an additional NPC with your specifications elsewhere***.

In addition to $1000 rewards, you will be able to work with our team on designing an NPC creature species****. You\u2019ll have input on the name and visual appearance of this species, as well as on traits you\u2019d like to see them possess***. In the case that these slots are full, then higher priced pledges levels will be able to substitute this slot with an additional NPC with their specifications***.
In addition to $1000 rewards, you will also be able to work with The Repopulation team to design a unique Generated Mission Template of up to 20 steps****.

We will include dinner for you and up to four guests at one of the conferences we attend in 2013. Transportation and lodging not included.  You may also choose one of the $1250 to $2000 reward tiers that still has a slot open.  You will be listed as an Executive Producer in the credits.

You will receive all of the rewards from all previous levels and a special monument will be placed in the OWON or FPR side commemorating your glorious acts.****.  You will be listed as an Executive Producer in the credits.
